headline: Franklin Resources Binance Collateral Program Links Gains To Digital Assets
summary: Franklin Resources (NYSE:BEN) and Binance have launched an institutional off exchange collateral program using tokenized money market fund shares. The program lets eligible clients post tokenized shares as collateral for digital asset trading while keeping assets held off exchange. The initiative uses Franklin Templeton’s Benji Technology Platform to connect traditional fund shares with digital trading venues.
